Electric Bass Guitar.name: AMPEG ROCKET 108 BASS COMBO AMP ROCKET 108
Electric Bass Guitar.description:
The Ampeg Rocket 108 is a compact yet powerful 30-watt bass combo amplifier featuring a single 8-inch speaker. It combines Ampeg's classic vintage styling with modern functionality, including the legendary Ampeg Legacy preamp and innovative Super Grit Technology (SGT‚Ñ¢) overdrive for authentic bass tones. With dual input sensitivity options (0dB and -15dB), auxiliary input for playing along with music, and a headphone output for silent practice, this lightweight 23 lb amp delivers professional Ampeg sound in a portable package.

Key features:
‚Ä¢ 30-watt power with 1x8" speaker configuration
‚Ä¢ Classic Ampeg Legacy preamp circuitry
‚Ä¢ Super Grit Technology (SGT‚Ñ¢) overdrive for adjustable distortion
‚Ä¢ Dual input sensitivity (0dB and -15dB) for various instrument outputs
‚Ä¢ Auxiliary input for connecting external audio sources
‚Ä¢ Headphone output for silent practice sessions
‚Ä¢ Lightweight design at just 23 lbs (10.5 kg)

The Ampeg Rocket 108 features the distinctive black tolex covering with silver grille cloth that's emblematic of Ampeg's heritage design. The amp's compact dimensions make it ideal for home practice, small rehearsals, or as a personal monitor on stage. The Super Grit Technology allows bassists to dial in anything from subtle warmth to aggressive overdrive while maintaining low-end definition. The -15dB input is particularly useful for active basses with higher output levels, preventing unwanted distortion when clean tones are desired.

Electric Bass Guitar.name: AMPEG MICRO-CL HEAD AMP + MC-210E SPEAKER CABINET
Electric Bass Guitar.description:
The AMPEG MICRO-CL HEAD AMP + MC-210E SPEAKER CABINET is a powerful bass amplification system delivering 100 watts of output through a classic stack configuration. This compact rig combines a solid-state preamp head unit with a dedicated 2√ó10" speaker cabinet, providing robust low-frequency response at 8 ohms. The classic black tolex covering and metal corner protectors give this Ampeg stack its distinctive professional appearance while maintaining portability for gigging musicians.

Key features:
‚Ä¢ 100 watts of power output
‚Ä¢ Solid-state preamp technology
‚Ä¢ Dual 10-inch low-frequency drivers
‚Ä¢ 8 ohm impedance for optimal performance
‚Ä¢ Classic stack configuration with separate head and cabinet
‚Ä¢ Durable black tolex covering with metal corner protectors
‚Ä¢ Compact design for portability without sacrificing tone

The AMPEG MICRO-CL HEAD AMP paired with the MC-210E SPEAKER CABINET represents Ampeg's commitment to providing professional bass amplification in a more manageable size. This micro stack maintains the iconic Ampeg aesthetic with its black tolex covering and metal hardware while delivering the punchy, defined bass tone the brand is known for. The head unit features multiple control knobs for precise sound shaping, while the cabinet's dual 10-inch speakers provide balanced frequency response suitable for practice, recording, and smaller performance venues.

Electric Bass Guitar.name: YAMAHA TRBX304 ELECTRIC BASS GUITAR  MIST GREEN
Electric Bass Guitar.description:
The YAMAHA TRBX304 Electric Bass Guitar in Mist Green combines premium construction with versatile sound capabilities. Featuring solid mahogany body construction and a 5-piece maple/mahogany neck, this bass delivers rich, warm tones with excellent sustain. The slim 38mm nut width ensures comfortable playability, while the 2-band active EQ with 5-way Performance EQ preset switch provides exceptional tonal versatility for various playing styles and musical genres.

Key features:
‚Ä¢ Solid mahogany body construction for rich, warm tone
‚Ä¢ 5-piece maple/mahogany neck for enhanced stability
‚Ä¢ Slim 38mm nut width for comfortable playability
‚Ä¢ 2-band active EQ for precise tone shaping
‚Ä¢ 5-way Performance EQ preset switch for versatile sound options
‚Ä¢ Sleek Mist Green finish
‚Ä¢ Dual humbucking pickups for powerful sound

The TRBX304 is part of Yamaha's respected TRBX series, known for professional-quality instruments at accessible price points. The Mist Green finish gives this bass a distinctive, modern aesthetic that stands out on stage. The instrument features a contoured body design for playing comfort during long performances, and the active electronics are powered by a 9V battery. The bass comes equipped with quality die-cast tuners for precise and stable tuning, and a solid bridge system that enhances sustain and intonation.

Electric Bass Guitar.name: Yamaha Bb434m Electric Bass Guitar
Electric Bass Guitar.description:
‚Ä¢ solid alder body for balanced tone and resonance
‚Ä¢ robust 5-piece neck construction for enhanced stability
‚Ä¢ 6-bolt miter neck joint for superior sustain and playability
‚Ä¢ ygd custom v5 pickups with alnico v magnets for warm, dynamic sound
‚Ä¢ vintage plus light convertible bridge and saddles for tonal versatility

Electric Bass Guitar.name: Squier Affinity Series¬Æ Precision electric Bass PJ Pack
Electric Bass Guitar.description:
The Squier Affinity Series Precision Bass PJ Pack is a complete starter kit featuring everything needed to begin playing bass guitar. This bundle includes a quality Precision Bass with PJ pickup configuration, essential accessories, and a practice amplifier - making it perfect for beginners.

Key features:
‚Ä¢ Precision Bass with PJ pickup configuration
‚Ä¢ Slim neck profile and thin body for comfortable playing
‚Ä¢ Fender Rumble 15 practice amplifier
‚Ä¢ Protective gig bag included
‚Ä¢ Adjustable guitar strap
‚Ä¢ 10-foot instrument cable
‚Ä¢ Sunburst finish on the bass guitar

The bass guitar features a classic Precision Bass body style with both Precision (P) and Jazz (J) pickups for versatile tone options. The included Rumble 15 amplifier provides clear, powerful sound for practice sessions. The slim neck profile and thin body make this instrument particularly suitable for beginners or players with smaller hands. The sunburst finish gives the bass a professional, classic appearance while the included gig bag ensures safe transport and storage.

Ukulele.name: ORTEGA RU4 BONFIRE SERIES CONCERT SPRUCE
Ukulele.description:
The ORTEGA RU4 BONFIRE SERIES CONCERT SPRUCE is a beautifully crafted concert-sized ukulele featuring a premium spruce top and sapele back and sides. This elegant instrument showcases a natural finish that highlights the wood's natural grain patterns, complemented by a traditional sound hole and bridge design. The concert size offers comfortable playability with a warm, balanced tone that's ideal for both beginners and experienced players seeking quality sound in a traditional ukulele format.

Key features:
‚Ä¢ Concert size for balanced tone and comfortable playability
‚Ä¢ Premium spruce top for bright, responsive sound
‚Ä¢ Sapele back and sides for warm tonal qualities
‚Ä¢ Natural wood finish highlighting authentic grain patterns
‚Ä¢ Traditional bridge and sound hole design
‚Ä¢ Quality tuning pegs for stable pitch
‚Ä¢ Classic Ortega craftsmanship and attention to detail

The ORTEGA RU4 from the Bonfire Series combines traditional ukulele design with quality tonewoods to create an instrument with excellent projection and resonance. The spruce top is known for its bright, clear tone and excellent sound projection, while the sapele back and sides add warmth and depth to the overall sound profile. The concert size is slightly larger than a soprano ukulele, offering more volume and a slightly deeper tone while remaining comfortable to hold and play. This ukulele features Ortega's attention to detail in construction, making it suitable for players looking to upgrade from beginner instruments without moving to professional price points.

Ukulele.name: ORTEGA UKULELE RUEL-MRD CONCERT ELEMENT SERIES METALLIC RED TOP
Ukulele.description:
The ORTEGA RUEL-MRD Concert Ukulele from the Element Series features a stunning metallic red spruce top complemented by catalpa wood back and sides. This concert-sized instrument offers the perfect balance of playability and rich tone for musicians of all levels. Designed with quality craftsmanship and attention to detail, this ukulele comes complete with a deluxe gig bag, making it ready for performances, practice sessions, or travel.

Key features:
‚Ä¢ Concert size for balanced tone and comfortable playability
‚Ä¢ Premium spruce top with eye-catching metallic red finish
‚Ä¢ Durable catalpa wood back and sides
‚Ä¢ Traditional ukulele design with quality tuning pegs
‚Ä¢ Includes deluxe gig bag for protection and transport
‚Ä¢ Part of ORTEGA's respected Element Series
‚Ä¢ Suitable for beginners and experienced players alike

The concert size of this ORTEGA ukulele offers slightly more volume and deeper bass response than soprano models, while remaining comfortable to hold and play. The combination of spruce and catalpa woods creates a balanced tonal profile with good projection and sustain. The metallic red finish not only provides visual appeal but also adds a layer of protection to the instrument. The included deluxe gig bag features padding and storage compartments to keep your ukulele safe when not in use.

Ukulele.name: ORTEGA RUNAB-CC UKULELE CONCERT NATURAL SOLID BAMBOO
Ukulele.description:
The ORTEGA RUNAB-CC is a premium concert-sized ukulele crafted with solid bamboo construction throughout, offering both natural beauty and exceptional tonal qualities. This professional-grade instrument features built-in MagusUke electronics with an integrated tuner for amplified performances and precise tuning. The ukulele comes complete with a deluxe gig bag, making it ready for transport to performances or practice sessions. With its sustainable bamboo build and professional features, this ukulele delivers warm, resonant sound in an elegant natural finish.

Key features:
‚Ä¢ Concert size format - ideal balance of playability and rich tone
‚Ä¢ Full solid bamboo construction for superior resonance and sustainability
‚Ä¢ Built-in MagusUke electronics with integrated tuner
‚Ä¢ Natural bamboo finish showcasing the wood's beautiful grain patterns
‚Ä¢ Cutaway body design for improved upper fret access
‚Ä¢ Includes deluxe gig bag for protection and transport
‚Ä¢ Professional-grade instrument suitable for performers and serious players

The ORTEGA RUNAB-CC features a cutaway body design that provides easier access to upper frets, making it suitable for more advanced playing techniques. Bamboo is known for its sustainability as a fast-growing resource, as well as its distinctive tonal properties that produce warm, balanced sound with good projection. The MagusUke electronics system allows players to connect to amplification systems for performances while maintaining the natural acoustic tone of the instrument. The maple fretboard provides smooth playability, while the distinctive headstock design adds to the ukulele's elegant aesthetic.

Ukulele.name: ORTEGA RUSWB-CC UKULELE CONCERT STONE WASHED BLUE
Ukulele.description:
The Ortega RUSWB-CC Concert Ukulele showcases a stunning stonewashed blue finish on solid bamboo construction. This premium concert-sized instrument features solid bamboo for both the top, back, and sides, delivering exceptional tonal qualities and visual appeal. The distinctive blue-streaked grain pattern creates a unique appearance that stands out from traditional ukuleles. Complete with a deluxe gig bag, this ukulele combines professional craftsmanship with convenient portability for musicians of all levels.

Key features:
‚Ä¢ Concert size for balanced tone and comfortable playability
‚Ä¢ Solid bamboo construction for top, back, and sides
‚Ä¢ Distinctive stonewashed blue finish with visible grain patterns
‚Ä¢ Premium tuning pegs for reliable tuning stability
‚Ä¢ Includes deluxe padded gig bag with Ortega branding
‚Ä¢ Eco-friendly bamboo material offers sustainability and durability
‚Ä¢ Unique aesthetic design makes it a standout performance instrument

The concert size of this ukulele offers a slightly larger body than soprano models, providing enhanced projection and a fuller sound while remaining comfortable to hold. Bamboo is known for its sustainability as a fast-growing resource and delivers a bright, clear tone with good projection. The stonewashed blue finish not only creates a striking visual appearance but also preserves the natural texture of the bamboo grain. The included deluxe gig bag features the Ortega logo, padded construction, and convenient carrying handle for safe transport between performances or practice sessions.

Ukulele.name: ORTEGA K2SS-BKC KEIKI UKULELE SET SOPRANO SUPER SCALE, BLUE KALEIDOSCOPE
Ukulele.description:
The ORTEGA K2SS-BKC KEIKI UKULELE SET features a stunning blue kaleidoscope design in a soprano super scale size. This beginner-friendly instrument combines an agathis top with a durable ABS body, creating a balanced sound with visual appeal. The complete set includes essential accessories for immediate play: a digital tuner, comfortable strap, picks for different playing styles, and a convenient carrying bag, making it perfect for young musicians or those starting their ukulele journey.

Key features:
‚Ä¢ Soprano super scale size with blue kaleidoscope design pattern
‚Ä¢ Constructed with agathis wood top and durable ABS plastic body
‚Ä¢ Includes digital clip-on tuner for precise instrument tuning
‚Ä¢ Comes with adjustable strap for comfortable playing
‚Ä¢ Multiple picks included for different playing styles
‚Ä¢ Protective carrying bag for easy transport and storage
‚Ä¢ Complete starter kit ideal for beginners and young musicians

The ORTEGA KEIKI line is designed specifically with young players and beginners in mind, with "Keiki" meaning "child" in Hawaiian. The super scale design offers slightly more space between frets compared to standard soprano ukuleles, making it easier for beginners to form chords and develop finger strength. The combination of the agathis wood top and ABS body provides durability while maintaining good acoustic properties, ideal for learning environments. The blue kaleidoscope pattern gives this instrument a distinctive appearance that stands out from traditional wooden ukuleles.

Electric Guitar.name: FENDER 231-1204-000 MUSTANG LT50 BLACK
Electric Guitar.description:
The Fender Mustang LT50 (231-1204-000) is a versatile 50-watt digital modeling guitar amplifier featuring a single 12" Fender Special Design speaker housed in a sturdy black wooden cabinet. This compact yet powerful combo amplifier combines Fender's legendary tone with modern digital technology, making it ideal for practice, recording, and small performance venues.

Key features:
‚Ä¢ 50-watt power output suitable for practice and small venues
‚Ä¢ Single 12" Fender Special Design guitar speaker for balanced tone
‚Ä¢ Durable black wooden cabinet construction
‚Ä¢ Digital modeling technology with multiple amp and effect presets
‚Ä¢ Intuitive control panel for easy sound customization
‚Ä¢ Compact and portable design for musicians on the go
‚Ä¢ Classic Fender styling with iconic logo

The Mustang LT50 represents Fender's commitment to combining traditional amplifier quality with modern digital capabilities. This amplifier is part of Fender's Mustang series, known for providing versatile tone options through digital modeling technology. The LT50 model offers an excellent balance of power, features, and portability, making it suitable for guitarists at various skill levels. The black textured covering and control panel layout maintain Fender's classic aesthetic while housing contemporary amplification technology.

Acoustic Guitar.name: YAMAHA  F310 ACOUSTIC GUITAR NATURAL
Acoustic Guitar.description:
The Yamaha F310 Acoustic Guitar features a classic dreadnought-style body with a natural finish, combining excellent sound quality with affordability. Built with a spruce top and traditional design elements, this guitar delivers the renowned Yamaha quality and craftsmanship at an accessible price point, making it ideal for beginners and intermediate players seeking a reliable instrument with authentic acoustic tone.

Key features:
‚Ä¢ Dreadnought-style body for full, rich sound
‚Ä¢ Natural finish with classic aesthetic
‚Ä¢ Spruce top construction for bright, clear tones
‚Ä¢ Rosewood fingerboard and bridge
‚Ä¢ Chrome die-cast tuners for reliable tuning stability
‚Ä¢ Traditional black pickguard design
‚Ä¢ Balanced sound suitable for various playing styles

The Yamaha F310 is part of Yamaha's renowned F series of acoustic guitars, designed to provide quality instruments at entry-level prices. The guitar features a comfortable neck profile that makes it accessible for beginners while still satisfying more experienced players. The natural wood finish showcases the guitar's quality materials, while the black and white binding adds a touch of elegance to this affordable instrument. The F310 produces a balanced tone that works well for strumming, fingerpicking, and various musical genres.

Acoustic Guitar.name: YAMAHA FX310A ACOUSTIC-ELECTRIC FOLK GUITAR
Acoustic Guitar.description:
The YAMAHA FX310A ACOUSTIC-ELECTRIC FOLK GUITAR combines traditional acoustic performance with electric versatility in an affordable package. Featuring a classic dreadnought-style body with a natural spruce top, this hybrid instrument delivers rich, resonant tones for unplugged play while the built-in ART pickup system faithfully reproduces your sound when connected to an amplifier or PA system.

Key features:
‚Ä¢ Classic dreadnought-style body for full, resonant sound
‚Ä¢ Natural spruce top construction for bright, clear tones
‚Ä¢ Built-in ART pickup system for authentic amplified sound
‚Ä¢ Versatile acoustic-electric design for both unplugged and plugged-in performance
‚Ä¢ Chrome die-cast tuners for precise tuning stability
‚Ä¢ Natural wood finish with black pickguard
‚Ä¢ Side-mounted control panel for easy sound adjustment

The FX310A represents Yamaha's commitment to quality craftsmanship at an accessible price point. The guitar features a comfortable neck profile suitable for players of all levels, while the rosewood-style fingerboard provides smooth playability across all frets. The ART (Acoustic Resonance Transducer) pickup system is specifically designed to capture the natural resonance and dynamics of acoustic playing, making this instrument ideal for both practice sessions and live performances where amplification is needed.

Acoustic Guitar.name: YAMAHA F310P ACOUSTIC GUITAR  PACKAGE
Acoustic Guitar.description:
The Yamaha F310P is a complete acoustic guitar starter package featuring a traditional western-style guitar with a spruce top. This comprehensive bundle includes essential accessories for beginners, offering Yamaha's renowned quality at an accessible price point.

Key features:
‚Ä¢ Traditional Western Body Design
‚Ä¢ Spruce Top Construction
‚Ä¢ Includes Protective Gigbag
‚Ä¢ Complete Accessory Pack (Strap, Picks, String Winder)
‚Ä¢ Built-in Pitch Pipe
‚Ä¢ Spare String Set
‚Ä¢ Guitar Capo Included

The F310P package comes with everything a beginner needs to start playing immediately. The guitar features Yamaha's signature build quality and attention to detail, while the included accessories ensure proper maintenance and playing comfort. The protective gigbag allows for safe transport and storage, while the assorted picks offer different playing experiences. The included capo and string winder make maintenance and playing in different keys easier for beginners.

Acoustic Guitar.name: Yamaha Jr2-tbs Junior-size 33-inch Travel Acoustic Guitar
Acoustic Guitar.description: The jr2 is a compact acoustic guitar modeled after our long selling fg series. Its compact size and authentic acoustic tone make the jr2 and excellent take along, play anywhere guitar. Great for campfire sing alongs, road trips or anywhere you want to be able to play. A mahogany finish utf finish back & side offers beautiful look and the instrument comes with a durable case.

Acoustic Guitar.name: YAMAHA FG820 SUNSET BLUE ACOUSTIC GUITAR
Acoustic Guitar.description:
The Yamaha FG820 in Sunset Blue is a premium dreadnought acoustic guitar featuring a solid spruce top and mahogany back and sides. This beautifully crafted instrument delivers warm, strong tones and exceptional playability through its innovative design and quality construction.

Key features:
‚Ä¢ Dreadnought-style body for full, rich sound
‚Ä¢ Solid spruce top for superior resonance
‚Ä¢ Mahogany back and sides for warm tone
‚Ä¢ Newly developed scalloped bracing pattern
‚Ä¢ Stunning sunset blue finish
‚Ä¢ Professional-grade construction

The FG820 represents Yamaha's commitment to quality acoustic instruments. The newly developed scalloped bracing pattern optimizes the sound production, enhancing the guitar's natural tone and projection. The combination of solid spruce top with mahogany back and sides creates an ideal balance of bright and warm tones, making it suitable for various playing styles. The sunset blue finish adds a distinctive aesthetic appeal to this professional-grade instrument.

Acoustic Guitar.name: Yamaha Transacoustic Guitar FG-TA Brown Sunburst
Acoustic Guitar.description:
Yamaha FG-TA TransAcoustic guitars transport you to new creative spaces with immersive reverb and lush chorus effects, without needing an amp or other external gear. For the singer/songwriter in you, the FG-TA features a combination of solid spruce top, mahogany back and sides, and scalloped bracing to create warmth, resonance and a bold sound.

Traditional western body

This medium-sized pedal board strikes an ideal balance between portability and functionality, providing sufficient real estate for a comprehensive effects setup while remaining manageable for transport between gigs. The thoughtfully designed slots and cutouts serve dual purposes - reducing overall weight while facilitating secure cable management. The anodized aluminum construction not only ensures longevity but also gives the board a professional aesthetic suitable for stage use. The included carrying case provides protection during transport and features additional storage space for cables, picks, and other accessories.

Music instruments Accessories.name: Line 6 Podgowl Electric Guitar Effects Processor
Music instruments Accessories.description: Compact guitar multi-effects processor, offering helix-quality amp, cab, and effect models in a user-friendly, streamlined floor unit with a color screen, expression pedal, and simple controls

Music instruments Accessories.name: LINE 6 HX STOMP ELECTRIC GUITAR MULTI-EFFECTS FLOOR PROCESSOR
Music instruments Accessories.description:
The LINE 6 HX STOMP is a compact yet powerful multi-effects floor processor designed for electric guitarists seeking professional-grade sound in a pedalboard-friendly format. This versatile unit combines a comprehensive suite of effects including distortion, delay, reverb, modulation, pitch shift, synth filter, compressor/limiter, and wah, with an integrated USB audio interface. Featuring a color LCD display, three programmable footswitches with LED indicators, and intuitive control knobs, the HX STOMP delivers studio-quality processing for both live performance and recording applications.

Key features:
‚Ä¢ Compact multi-effects processor with professional-grade sound quality
‚Ä¢ Color LCD display for easy effect visualization and editing
‚Ä¢ Three programmable footswitches with customizable LED color indicators
‚Ä¢ Comprehensive effects library including distortion, delay, reverb, modulation, and more
‚Ä¢ Integrated USB audio interface for direct recording
‚Ä¢ Intuitive control knobs for real-time parameter adjustments
‚Ä¢ Pedalboard-friendly design with sturdy metal construction

The LINE 6 HX STOMP utilizes the same HX modeling technology found in the larger Helix family of processors, delivering authentic amp and effects models in a significantly smaller footprint. The device allows users to run up to six simultaneous effect blocks, creating complex signal chains that can be saved as presets. With its robust I/O capabilities, the HX STOMP can function as a complete rig replacement, a front-end for an amplifier, or integrate seamlessly into an existing pedalboard setup. The unit's 24-bit/96kHz audio conversion ensures pristine sound quality whether performing live or recording in the studio.

Music instruments Accessories.name: FENDER AMP KEYCHAIN HOLDER WITH KEYCHAIN PLUGS
Music instruments Accessories.description:
The Fender Amp Keychain Holder is a unique wall-mounted key organizer designed to replicate a miniature Fender amplifier. This functional piece of musical memorabilia features authentic amp details including real amp grill cloth, brushed metal Fender logo, and a built-in amp handle. What makes this key holder truly innovative is its use of actual amplifier inputs that accept real guitar plug keychains, allowing you to "plug in" your keys just like a guitar into an amp.

Key features:
‚Ä¢ Authentic miniature Fender amp design with realistic texture
‚Ä¢ Features genuine amp grill cloth for authentic appearance
‚Ä¢ Includes brushed metal Fender logo
‚Ä¢ Functional built-in amp handle
‚Ä¢ Uses real amplifier input jacks for storing keys
‚Ä¢ Comes with guitar plug keychains
‚Ä¢ Compact size: 8‚Ä≥ x 3‚Ä≥ x 1.5‚Ä≥

This "Jack Rack" wall mounting key hanger lets you "hang your keys like a rockstar" as noted on the packaging. Perfect for musicians, music enthusiasts, and Fender fans, this key holder serves as both a practical organization solution and a conversation-starting piece of decor. The clever design allows you to store your keys by plugging the guitar jack keychains into the amp's input ports, mimicking the way a guitarist would connect to their amplifier. The compact dimensions make it suitable for entryways, home studios, or any wall space needing both functionality and musical flair.

Music instruments Accessories.name: KONIG & MEYER 17580-014-55 FOLDABLE ACOUSTIC GUITAR STAND BLACK
Music instruments Accessories.description:
The Konig & Meyer 17580-014-55 is a professional-grade foldable guitar stand designed specifically for acoustic guitars. This black stand features an innovative adjustable crossbar system and protective rubber padding to safely support instruments of various sizes.

Key features:
‚Ä¢ Foldable design for easy transport and storage
‚Ä¢ Adjustable crossbar to accommodate different guitar sizes
‚Ä¢ Protective rubber padding to prevent instrument damage
‚Ä¢ Stable A-frame construction
‚Ä¢ Durable black finish
‚Ä¢ Non-slip rubber feet

The stand's innovative rubber structure provides superior protection at all contact points with the instrument. Its proven A-frame design ensures stability while holding the guitar securely at an optimal angle. The folding mechanism allows for compact storage and easy transportation between performances. The stand is built with high-quality materials that meet professional touring standards.

Music instruments Accessories.name: PROEL FC820 DOUBLE ELECTRIC GUITAR STAND
Music instruments Accessories.description:
The PROEL FC820 is a professional-grade double guitar stand designed to securely hold two electric, acoustic, or bass guitars simultaneously. It features a sturdy A-frame design with universal support arms and protective neck collars for instrument safety.

Key features:
‚Ä¢ Holds two guitars simultaneously

‚Ä¢ Protective neck collars prevent damage
‚Ä¢ Stable A-frame construction

The stand's versatile design accommodates various guitar sizes and styles, from electric to acoustic and bass guitars. The protective padding on contact points ensures instruments remain scratch-free, while the robust metal construction provides stability and durability. When not in use, the stand can be folded flat for convenient storage and transport.

Music instruments Accessories.name: Fender 099-0918-073 Guitar Cable
Music instruments Accessories.description:
The Fender 099-0918-073 is a premium 18.6-foot (5.7m) instrument cable in an attractive Blue Dream color, featuring a straight to right-angle connector design. This professional-grade cable is ideal for guitar and bass applications, offering reliable performance for both stage and studio use.

‚Ä¢ Straight to right-angle 1/4-inch connectors
‚Ä¢ Distinctive Blue Dream color with fabric jacket
‚Ä¢ Professional-grade construction
‚Ä¢ Gold-plated connectors for optimal signal transfer
‚Ä¢ Low-noise performance
‚Ä¢ Durable strain relief at connector points

The cable's right-angle connector design is particularly useful for tight spaces and helps reduce strain on instrument input jacks. The woven fabric jacket not only provides an attractive appearance but also helps prevent tangling and adds durability. Perfect for festival performances and professional gigging musicians who need reliable, longer-length cables with premium signal quality. Music instruments Accessories.description:

The pins feature a smooth, tapered design for easy installation and removal.

Music instruments Accessories.name: FENDER 099-0823-005 GUITAR CABLE
Music instruments Accessories.description:
The Fender 099-0823-005 is a premium 30-foot coiled guitar cable in striking Fiesta Red, featuring straight to angled connectors. This Original Series cable combines classic styling with reliable performance for both stage and studio use.

‚Ä¢ Optimized for vocal performance

The microphone features Yamaha's signature build quality and attention to detail in a professional package suitable for both stage and studio applications.

The distinctive black finish and modern design aesthetic align with Yamaha's professional audio equipment lineup. The build quality reflects Yamaha's commitment to durability and reliability in professional audio gear.

The YAMAHA AG08 is a professional 8-channel live streaming mixer that combines comprehensive audio control with advanced streaming capabilities. This versatile console features two phantom-powered inputs for condenser microphones, an integrated USB audio interface for seamless computer connectivity, and creative tools including voice changer and sampler functions. ‚Ä¢ 8-channel mixing capability with professional-grade faders

The YAMAHA AG08 features a sleek white design with clearly labeled controls and multiple illuminated buttons for easy operation. The control surface is organized into logical sections with input channels on the left, master controls in the center, and specialized functions on the right. The V4S4 continues KRK's legacy of professional studio monitoring solutions, featuring their signature yellow Kevlar woofer for precise bass response. The monitor's bi-amped design splits power between the woofer and tweeter for optimal performance. Its compact size makes it particularly suitable for home studios, production workstations, or any space where accurate sound monitoring is needed in a smaller footprint.

Live Streaming, Studio and Recording.description:

Live Streaming, Studio and Recording.description:
The Yamaha HS8 is a professional 8-inch powered studio monitor speaker designed for accurate audio monitoring in music production environments. It delivers precise sound reproduction and flat frequency response essential for professional mixing and audio production.

The HS8 is part of Yamaha's renowned HS series of studio monitors, known for their accuracy and reliability in professional audio environments. The monitor features a distinctive white woofer cone and black cabinet design that has become iconic in recording studios worldwide. While sold individually, these monitors are typically used in pairs for stereo monitoring applications. The speaker is designed for near-field to mid-field monitoring and is ideal for home studios, professional recording facilities, and post-production environments.

The build quality reflects Yamaha's commitment to durability and reliability in professional audio gear.

Analog Mixers.description:
The Yamaha MG20XU is a professional 20-channel mixing console featuring USB connectivity and built-in digital effects. This versatile mixer combines Yamaha's renowned audio quality with comprehensive mixing capabilities and studio-grade processing in a robust design.

The MG20XU is part of Yamaha's professional MG series, designed for live sound, recording, and installation applications. The mixer features high-quality D-PRE preamps, ensuring pristine audio capture. The USB connectivity allows for direct recording to computers and integration with digital audio workstations. The console includes comprehensive routing options, monitor sends, and group buses for flexible signal management. The built-in effects processor offers various reverb, delay, and modulation effects for enhanced mixing capabilities.

Analog Mixers.description:
The YAMAHA MG16XU is a professional 16-channel mixing console featuring USB connectivity and built-in effects. This versatile mixer combines Yamaha's audio quality with comprehensive mixing capabilities, making it ideal for live sound, recording, and studio applications.

The USB interface allows for direct recording to a computer and playback capabilities. Compatible with industry-standard DAW software including Cubase AI and Cubase LE, this mixer bridges the gap between live sound reinforcement and digital recording needs.

Yamaha Classical Guitar.description:
The Yamaha C40 Black Classic Guitar is a full-size classical guitar that combines affordability with Yamaha's renowned quality. This elegant black model delivers outstanding tone and craftsmanship, making it an ideal choice for beginning classical guitarists.
